name: MonsterFloorBuilder
description:
MonsterFloorBuilder

Goal

Your Goal is to drive  monsters to their home

How to Play.

Press Pause and Drag the Tetris Pieces to make a path for the monster

Next Steps.

I would like to solve some minor bugs and more monsters and more levels of course, but for I week effort I am very pleased with the results

Also if you found a bug let me know 

Audio.

The music was made by  bossandpp@gmail.com
